games.title: TB World
games.description:
Discover the fascinating world of the game Toka Life, which will give you a sea of creativity and joy! Here you can bring your fantasies to life, creating stylish images for characters and cozy interiors.

The design process will be a real pleasure: choose from a variety of clothes, accessories and interior items to make each image and space unique. Transform your characters and their surroundings to create a unique atmosphere.

This game is your personal creativity workshop where you create your own story. Start your exciting journey into the world of design today and let your ideas flow, creating unique images and cozy interiors!
games.howToPlayText:
The game opens up endless possibilities for creativity and fun, with your main task being to bring your fantasies to life and create unique stories.

The controls are intuitive and user-friendly, making it perfect for players of all ages. The simple interface allows you to easily move characters, items, and decor by swiping across the screen. You can tap on clothing and accessories to dress up your characters and drag items to decorate interiors.

In TB World, there are no strict rules or fixed storylines. You become the author of your own adventures and stories, using a wide range of scenarios, characters, and items. Your imagination is the only limit in this world of creativity and possibilities!

games.title: World of Labubu. Life and Creativity
games.description:
«World of Labubu. Life and Creativity» is a colorful dress-up and interior design game for fans of creativity and fun. Create your own Labubu by choosing eyes, nose, mouth, colors, outfits, hats and accessories. Each character can be unique and reflect your personal style.

After customizing your hero, explore cozy houses on the map and decorate the interiors. Place furniture, hang paintings, add details and create rooms that match your vision. There are no strict rules here — only your imagination and freedom.

If you are a fan of Toca Boca or love creative games where you can dress up characters and design spaces, you’ll feel right at home in «World of Labubu. Life and Creativity». Experiment, express yourself and build your own stories!
games.howToPlayText:
In «World of Labubu. Life and Creativity» everything is simple:

1. Create your Labubu — choose eyes, nose, mouth, colors and style.

2. Pick outfits, hats and accessories to highlight your character’s look.

3. Enter the houses on the map and start interior decorating.

4. Arrange furniture, hang paintings, add details and make rooms cozy.

Controls: use your mouse to select and place items. Fans of creative games like Toca Boca will quickly feel at home — just experiment and create your own unique worlds!
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/world-of-labubu-life-and-creativity?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Makeup Fruits
games.description: Have you ever imagined transforming a watermelon into a stunning masterpiece? At Makeup Fruits, you can creatively enhance fruits with cosmetics. Enjoy this fun game on your device and explore a vibrant world of fruity style, where each transformation allows you to express your flair.
games.howToPlayText:
Have you ever imagined giving a watermelon a makeover? How about adding a flutter of eyelashes or a swipe of lipstick to a juicy melon? In Makeup Fruits, your mission is to help these delightful fruits dazzle with beauty. It's all in your hands to adorn them with the perfect makeup and accessories for their stunning transformation!

Click to select the fruit you want to transform into a beauty icon, then proceed to choose and apply a variety of makeup options. Explore a diverse selection of brands, powder colors, eyelashes, lipsticks, stickers, and more!

At the end, you'll be able to take a "selfie" of your fabulous creation to share with your friends.

You'll also earn "gems" as a reward for your work. These gems can be used to unlock exciting new items and keep the fun going!
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/makeup-fruits?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Home Design: Decorate House
games.description:
Welcome to renovation game, where all your dreams come true! Renovate and decorate your home and solve challenging puzzles with this relaxing match 3 design game!

If you ever dreamed of having a mansion of your own, now’s your chance in this redecor game! Move into your mansion with tons of rooms, gardens, swimming pools, playgrounds, and decorating this house! Everything you can imagine you’d find in a house decor we got it here!

Home Design: Decorate House is not just a home decoration and matching game:
• A combination of match 3 game puzzles plus home decorating gameplay brings you an overwhelming fun gaming experience!
• Design, decorate, unlock new rooms, plenty of house areas to renovate, never get bored!
• All mansion makeover needs is a brilliant mind of a talented designer like you!

Decorate the library, kitchen, garden, tennis court, swimming pool and many more house areas to come! Help her renovate dream house to make it the best manor in town in this puzzle game!
games.howToPlayText: Complete levels by playing match 3 and earn brushes. On these brushes you can repair and decorate your home.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/home-design-decorate-house?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Mansion Design - Match 3
games.description:
Decorate and renovate the mansion and garden by beating match-3 blast levels! Makeover each room with a large selection of classical furnitures and exquisite decorations, including your personal bathroom and garden.

Features:
● Follow the storyline and discover all the hidden secrets in your mansion!
● Fun and challenging match-3 levels with unique boosters and explosive combinations! 
● Help young lady cast magic spell by swapping and matching pieces!
● Renovate the mansion and design the interior, keep your home under control.
games.howToPlayText:
● Match 3 or more items of the same type to get more powerfull boosters.
● Complete level objectives.
● Get more Scrolls.
● Complete Tasks.
● Use boosters.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/mansion-design--match-3?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Cosplay Gamer Girls
games.description: Two BFF are going to a summer cosplay festival. They love computer games. Help the girls choose costumes for their favorite video game heroes and princesses. It is very important for a cosplayer to create a complete look: from makeup and hair to dress. Lots of original and gorgeous outfits are waiting for you!
games.howToPlayText: Help the girls create a cosplay based on a computer game. Apply bright makeup. Choose the appropriate items of clothing, shoes, accessories and jewelry that match the theme of this cosplay. A very important point is the choice of hairstyle or wig. The result can be saved as a PNG image. Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch on touchscreens is used to control it.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/cosplay-gamer-girls?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Home Design - Match 3
games.description: Dive into a fun blend of creativity and strategy with Home Design - Match 3. Solve puzzles, design your ideal home, and unleash powerful boosters. Tackle challenging tasks and earn rewards to enhance your decor. Get ready to personalize your living spaces on any device!
games.howToPlayText:
- Match 3 or more items 
- Use boosters
- Complete level objectives
Just use your mouse or tap on the screen, and all the beauty will unfold!
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/home-design--match-3?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Besties on Wednesday
games.description: A young bestie goes to school to learn magic and make new friends. She has her own special style. The girl prefers black colors in clothes and a gothic look. Her roommate likes bright colors in her clothes. It will not be easy for new acquaintances to find a common language. However, this bright girl is not as simple as it seems at first glance. She has her secrets. Try to choose for each student an image that suits her perfectly. And one day these besties will be BFF.
games.howToPlayText: Fate brings together two very different girls-students in the walls of the School of Magic. Help the girls create their own unique image: choose make up, hairstyles, outfits and accessories, that match the characters of the girls. And, perhaps, they will eventually become best friends. The result can be saved as a PNG image. Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch on touch screen is used for control.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/besties-on-wednesday?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Brainrots: Dress Up & Interior Design
games.description:
«Brainrots: Dress Up & Interior Design» is a bright dress-up and interior design game where everyone can show creativity. Six popular heroes are waiting for you: Cappuccino Assassino, Ballerina Cappuccina, Bombardiro Crocodilo, Orcalero, Chimpanzini Bananini and Tralalelo Tralalata. Each character is unique, and you can create their own style: choose outfits, hats and accessories, mix looks and invent fashionable combinations.

Then move on to interior design! Decorate rooms with furniture, hang paintings, add cozy details and create spaces to your taste. There are no limits or restrictions — only your imagination and freedom of expression.

If you enjoy creative games like Toca Boca, where you can dress up characters and design rooms, «Brainrots: Dress Up & Interior Design» is the perfect choice. Experiment, create stories and bring your ideas to life!
games.howToPlayText:
In «Brainrots: Dress Up & Interior Design», it’s easy to start:

1. Choose a character from six available heroes.

2. Pick outfits, hats and accessories to highlight the style.

3. Decorate the room interior: arrange furniture, paintings and details.

4. Combine styles, imagine stories and create unique designs.

Controls: use the mouse to select and place items. The game is simple, fun and quickly pulls you into the creative process.
